page.title: 02 INTRODUCTION
page.content: how Butterleigh got its name("Leigh" means meadow and dates from Saxon times). The village itself is very small and has few amenities,the only things that it has are a {Post Office,A Pub }and a {Blacksmith's}.The last bus to and from Butterleigh ran 10 years ago.There is a {Village Hall}which used to be a { {School }until 1960.The {Church }was originally built in Norman Times although it has been rebuilt over the years.There is no {doctor }and so people have to travel to Tiverton,Cullompton or Silverton.
